All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, androidx.activity.contextaware.ContextAware, androidx.activity.FullyDrawnReporterOwner, androidx.activity.OnBackPressedDispatcherOwner, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultRegistryOwner, androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, androidx.core.app.OnMultiWindowModeChangedProvider, androidx.core.app.OnNewIntentProvider, androidx.core.app.OnPictureInPictureModeChangedProvider, androidx.core.app.OnUserLeaveHintProvider, androidx.core.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, androidx.core.content.OnConfigurationChangedProvider, androidx.core.content.OnTrimMemoryProvider, androidx.core.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, androidx.core.view.MenuHost, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class CreateEventActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
CreateEventActivity Covers organizer stories on the creation side: - US 02.01.01: create event + generate unique QR that links to event in app. - US 02.01.04: set registration period. - US 02.02.03: toggle geolocation requirement for event. - US 02.03.01: optionally limit waiting list size (maxSpots). - US 02.04.01 / 02.04.02: upload/update event poster. - US 02.05.02: specify how many entrants to sample for invitations.

  • Method Details

    • onCreate

      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Called when the activity is first created. Initializes Firebase, binds UI elements, sets up pickers, configures the poster selector, and attaches button listeners.
      Overrides:
      onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
      Parameters:
      savedInstanceState - the previously saved state bundle, if any

    • openMapPicker

      private void openMapPicker()

    • bindViews

      private void bindViews()
      Binds all XML layout views to their corresponding fields. Called once during activity initialization.

    • setupMapPicker

      private void setupMapPicker()
      Sets up a launcher to receive selected event coordinates from MapPickerActivity.

    • setupLocationAutocomplete

      private void setupLocationAutocomplete()

    • setupCategorySpinner

      private void setupCategorySpinner()
      Sets up the event category spinner with predefined category options. These correspond to the organizer user stories for event tagging.

    • setupDateTimePickers

      private void setupDateTimePickers()
      Initializes all date and time picker buttons and attaches listeners. When a date/time is selected, the appropriate TextView is updated.

    • showDatePicker

      private void showDatePicker(Calendar calendar, Runnable onDateSet)
      Displays a date picker dialog for the given calendar instance.
      Parameters:
      calendar - the calendar object to update with the user's selection
      onDateSet - a callback executed after the user selects a date

    • showTimePicker

      private void showTimePicker(Calendar calendar, Runnable onTimeSet)
      Displays a time picker dialog for the given calendar instance.
      Parameters:
      calendar - the calendar object to update with the selected time
      onTimeSet - a callback executed after the user selects a time

    • updateDateTimeDisplay

      private void updateDateTimeDisplay(android.widget.TextView textView, Calendar calendar)
      Updates the provided TextView to display the formatted date/time from the associated calendar instance.
      Parameters:
      textView - the TextView to update
      calendar - the calendar containing the new date/time

    • setupPosterPicker

      private void setupPosterPicker()
      Configures the ActivityResultLauncher used to pick images from the gallery. When an image is selected, a preview is displayed on the screen.

    • loadPosterPreview

      private void loadPosterPreview(android.net.Uri uri)
      Loads and decodes the selected poster image into a Bitmap preview. Uses ImageDecoder on API 28+ and MediaStore for older devices.
      Parameters:
      uri - the Uri of the poster image selected by the user

    • openPosterPicker

      private void openPosterPicker()
      Launches an image picker intent to allow the organizer to choose a poster image for the event.

    • createEvent

      private void createEvent()
      Validates all event fields and inputs. Ensures required fields are filled, dates are chosen, optional numeric fields are valid, and posters meet size limits. If validation succeeds, begins Firestore event creation.

    • createEventInFirestore

      private void createEventInFirestore(android.net.Uri posterUri, String title, String description, String location, String category, String startDate, String endDate, String regStart, String regEnd, Long maxSpots, boolean geoRequired)
      Creates the Firestore event document and populates all fields: event metadata, timing, category, organizer email, lists, and poster URL. After creation, uploads the poster if present.
      Parameters:
      posterUri - URI of the selected poster image (nullable)
      title - event title
      description - event description
      location - event location
      category - event category
      startDate - starting date/time of the event
      endDate - ending date/time of the event (nullable)
      regStart - registration start timestamp (nullable)
      regEnd - registration end timestamp (nullable)
      maxSpots - optional limit on entrants (nullable)
      geoRequired - whether geolocation check-in is required

    • uploadPosterAndAttachToEvent

      private void uploadPosterAndAttachToEvent(String eventId, android.net.Uri posterUri, String deepLink)
      Uploads the event poster image to Firebase Storage and saves the resulting download URL in the Firestore event document.
      Parameters:
      eventId - unique Firestore event ID
      posterUri - URI of the selected poster file
      deepLink - deep link associated with this event

    • goBackToOrganizerHome

      private void goBackToOrganizerHome()
      Navigates the organizer back to the OrganizerActivity home screen. Clears the back stack to prevent users from returning to CreateEventActivity.

    • fillLocationFromCoordinates

      private void fillLocationFromCoordinates(double lat, double lng)

    • geocodeTextLocation

      private void geocodeTextLocation(String textLocation)

    • dateOnly

      private String dateOnly(Calendar c)

    • timeOnly

      private String timeOnly(Calendar c)
